channel.title: [PI] How to add portals and make them teleport you?
channel.description:
Hello guys, how can i add portals and make them teleport me to a certain place.
Thanks for all help :)

item.title: [PI] How to add portals and make them teleport you?
item.dc:creator: @ZioBotic ZioBotic
item.description:
@ZioBotic wrote:

Go to objectmanager.java search for

And add this under one of them.

Now go to actionhandler.java Just search for 2469 in actionhandler.java and replace the current teleporting portal code with that,

here i edited mine and its really cool. youcan have it case *portalcode i used 2469*: c.getPA().movePlayer(*x axes*, *y axes*, *height*); c.sendMessage("Your Message Here"); c.startAnimation(13654); break;

That Took me a long timeee (: ur lucky i could be assed

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to add portals and make them teleport you?

item.title: [PI] How to add portals and make them teleport you?
item.dc:creator: @Epicmaul Epicmaul
item.description:
@Epicmaul wrote:

case [objectid]:
c.getPA().startTeleport2(X Coords, Y Coords, 0);
c.sendMessage(“Any message u want here”);
break;

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to add portals and make them teleport you?
